Hi, I’m Ophelia.

Photographe indépendante basée à Genève, je couvre vos évènements, concert, EVJF, ou session portrait.

I love crafting images that feel like a memory—natural light, candid gestures, and a touch of mood. Whether it’s a wedding morning, an alpine blue hour, or a quick editorial in a tiny studio, I keep the process relaxed and collaborative.

Available across Switzerland and nearby regions. I speak English and German.

Selected Clients
  • Independent artists & creatives
  • Small brands and studios
  • Families and couples

Gear & Approach

I usually shoot with a full-frame mirrorless setup and a small set of primes. I keep lighting simple and prefer natural light; for editorials I add gentle continuous light when needed. Delivery is via a private online gallery—full-resolution and web-ready files.
